title: Presidential Memorandum--National Defense Authorization Act | whitehouse.gov
content:
The White House
Office of the Press Secretary


For Immediate Release
February 07, 2011

 



Presidential Memorandum--National Defense Authorization Act 





	Attached is a memorandum from the President to the Secretary of Defense and the Secretary of Energy regarding the annual update to the Report Specified in Section 1251 of the National Defense Authorization Act for Fiscal Year 2010.
